posts.post_content:
I would disagree that this is best Elf card. Best card for an Elf deck maybe, but Llanowars are **much** more versatile. They are extremely useful in almost any {G} deck, where this is only useful in Elf-only decks.
  
   
Not saying this card sucks. On the contrary, this is amazing, but NOT "the best Elf" or "best 1/1 creature".
posts.html:

Posted By: VirtueVsVice (11/7/2009 3:17:18 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This is a great card with a lot of potential, but I think it is a bit overrated. It's currently rated as THE #1 creature on the entire website... of all time??
  
   
Very powerful mana generation, but only effective in a deck that ramps quickly with other mana sources like [llanowar elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=llanowar elves). An absolute must have in elf decks, to be sure.
  
   
4/5
